text: Susan Adams Delano McKelvey (1883-1964) was an American botanist and author, noted for being the botanist of the Arnold Arboretum. McKelvey traveled around the United States throughout her life gathering plant specimens, and authored several books. == Works == * * * * * == References == Category:1883 births Category:1964 deaths Category:American women scientists Category:American botanists Category:American women botanists
title: Susan Delano McKelvey
